availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel Birch (Louisville, Jefferson Co., provision dealer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, provision dealer. Native of England. Son of John Birch and Sarah Birch. Married to Eliza Birch. Father of Sarah Birch, Martha Birch, Hannah Birch, Margeret Birch, and Mary Birch. Clerk in Jefferson County in 1850. Provision dealer in Jefferson County in 1860. Employed Anna Davis in Jefferson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 3, p. 239B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 8, p. 604-605.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 7, p. 8A.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport â€“ Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7007129, Jefferson County Deaths, p. 133..
